Zidane Pastikan Bale Bertahan di Madrid, Setidaknya Sampai Akhir Musim
06 Nov 2019, 00:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Tidak ada permasalahan yang terjadi di antara Zinedine Zidane dengan Gareth Bale. Malahan, pelatih asal Prancis tersebut ingin dia bertahan di Real Madrid setidaknya hingga akhir musim ini.
Seperti yang diketahui, ada banyak rumor yang memberitakan bahwa Zidane dengan Bale sedang tidak akur. Terutama pada akhir musim kemarin, di mana Zidane acap kali melontarkan kritikan bahkan tak memainkan Bale dalam beberapa kesempatan.
Pada bursa transfer musim panas kemarin, Bale sempat diberitakan tinggal selangkah lagi bergabung dengan Jiangsu Suning. Namun menjelang kepindahannya, manajemen Los Merengues langsung membatalkan transfer agar sang pemain bertahan.
Belakangan Bale juga tidak sering diturunkan oleh Zidane. Pemain berkebangsaan Wales tersebut baru mencatatkan tujuh penampilan dalam semua kompetisi musim ini. Menurut kabar yang tersiar, Bale sedang mengalami permasalahan pada betisnya.

Zidane Ensures Bale Survives in Madrid, At Least Until End of Season
Nov 6 2019, 00:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - There are no problems between Zinedine Zidane and Gareth Bale. In fact, the Frenchman wants him to stay at Real Madrid at least until the end of the season.
As you know, there are many rumors that say that Zidane and Bale are not getting along. Especially at the end of last season, where Zidane often criticized not even playing Bale on several occasions.
At the transfer market last summer, Bale was reportedly just one step away from joining Jiangsu Suning. But before his move, Los Merengues management immediately canceled the transfer so that the player defended.
Later on Bale also was not often revealed by Zidane. The Welshman has just made seven appearances in all competitions this season. According to the news that spread, Bale is experiencing problems in his calves.
